ComicInfo.Title: Ghost War, Part 1
ComicInfo.Summary: It's 1944 and for nearly two decades, Henry Preston and his wife Pearl Jones have tried to live a quiet life. But with war raging overseas, Henry feels he can no longer live in the shadows, and makes a deal to join a covert mission to a remote Japanese island inhabited by an enemy far more dangerous than any Axis powers!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Metron on 2024-06-17 13:29:00. [Issue ID 62693]
ComicInfo.Characters: Pearl Jones,Calvin Poole,Skinner Sweet,Henry Preston,Linden Hobbes
ComicInfo.Teams: The Vassals of the Morning Star,Vampires,American Vampires
